meanings.sent1: She attends her triweekly yoga classes to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The triweekly garbage collection helps keep the neighborhood clean.
meanings.sent3: The triweekly visits from her in-laws can be exhausting but also fun.
meanings.sent4: His triweekly jogging routine is like a steady heartbeat for his fitness.
meanings.sent5: The triweekly reminders on her phone ensure she never misses a dose of her medication.

meanings.definition: A publication that is issued three times a week.
meanings.sent1: The triweekly newspaper always has the latest local news.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the triweekly magazine during my lunch break.
meanings.sent3: The triweekly newsletter is a great way to stay informed and entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite part of the triweekly journal is the crossword puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The triweekly comic strip never fails to make her laugh.
